Send365Mail

Send365Mail.Rd

The Send365Mail function sends an email using Microsoft 365's Outlook service via the Microsoft365R package. It allows you to specify the recipients, subject, body, and optional attachments. After each function call, it performs a 5-second pause to avoid excessive email sending.

Usage

Send365Mail(receiver, mail_cc, subject, mail_body = "", mail_attachment = NULL)

Arguments

receiver

A character vector of email addresses to receive the email.

mail_cc

A character vector of email addresses to be added as CC recipients.

subject

A character string representing the subject of the email.

mail_body

A character string representing the body of the email. Defaults to NULL, which means no body is set. If provided, it should be in HTML format.

mail_attachment

A character vector containing file paths to attachments to be included in the email. Defaults to NULL, meaning no attachments are included.

Value

None. The function sends an email but does not return any values.
